original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṁ karonti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ gihiveyyāvaccam karonti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ gihiveyyāvaccam karissanti iti pe
saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ gihi veyyāvaccam karonti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṁ karissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ gihiveyyāvaccam karissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
yā pana bhikkhunī gihiveyyāvaccam kareyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: agārikassa yāguṁ vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā pacati, sāṭakaṁ vā veṭhanaṁ vā dhovati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agārikassa yāgum vā bhattam vā khādanīyam vā pacati sāṭakam vā veṭhanam vā dhovati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: attano veyyāvaccakarassa yāguṁ vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā pacati, sāṭakaṁ vā veṭhanaṁ vā dhovati,
analyzed: attanaḥ veyyāvacca karassa yāgum vā bhattam vā khādanīyam vā pacati sāṭakam vā veṭhanam vā dhovati
